pageTitle: UAB - Human Resources - Organizational Learning & Development
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {16967=BLAZE participants are selected through a competitive application process. Each May, we invite Deans and Vice Presidents at UAB to nominate faculty and staff in their organization who they think would benefit from the BLAZE Leadership Academy. Nominees are then asked to submit a written application, and participants are selected for the program based on a review of applications. If you are interested in participating in BLAZE, please talk with your supervisor., 47391=2013-2014, 58025=2011-2012, 51829=2012-2013, 61986=2010-2011}
textBeforeTable: Compiled by Dean Harold Jones         | Print |            If you have questions about BLAZE, please contact: Emily Wykle Organizational Development Specialist Human Resources (205) 934-3955 ewykle@uab.edu     | Print | BLAZE participants are selected through a competitive application process. Each May, we invite Deans and Vice Presidents at UAB to nominate faculty and staff in their organization who they think would benefit from the BLAZE Leadership Academy. Nominees are then asked to submit a written application, and participants are selected for the program based on a review of applications. If you are interested in participating in BLAZE, please talk with your supervisor. | Print | Nomination Process BLAZE Talent Management Training
